name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by sean1058, tttt2, miche, Zem)

name: wehavemagnums
text: Premium Vlad.

name: soticoto
text: Vlad never did time because he was never caught.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: yeah, i'll buy that.

name: gmm
text: That really is a believable explanation.

name: djwhiterabbit
text: that's a reaction i think i'll need to start employing.

name: wittyname
text:
Before I even read Achewood, a friend of mine was telling me about this arc and told me that quote.

To me, it is the one line that pretty much explains my love for Achewood. It's why I'm hooked.

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked as spam and excluded. retardo: What a douche. (reported by madnes, Overmedicated, Howard)

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked as spam and excluded. retardo: What a douche. (reported by snoozebar, mistlethrush, flynn)

name: agika
text: A comment left by agika was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by SaulBellow, aHatOfPig, MrKennedy)

name: catachresis
text: Yeah, but Vlad does it with style.

name: nurdbot
text: German people today are so nice and tidy.

name: djwhiterabbit
text: also, why does vlad have no hair during this story arc?

name: grooveholmes
text: Vlad had a mohawk after the great outdoor fight, so I assume he got tired of it and shaved it all off.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Vlad is wearink wife-beater to get into role. Is hilarious!

name: centipede_damascus
text: Ray rented a career criminal from the local prison.

name: norrin
text: I assumed it was a squirrel. For some reason this was clear as day to me when I read the strip. It wasn't until later that I realized they never show him/her/it.

name: waldo913
text: Squirrels have their own special police force, ambulance service and, presumably prisons.  Though in your defense, they never said it was a normal (cat, bear, tiger, etc) criminal.

name: neaner
text: Oh, I assumed Nice Pete was in the box!

name: cracklewater
text: Miami is a career prisoner , which sounds less sucessful (yet, strangely, more dignified) than a career criminal.

name: anzio
text: That just means he's really good at being in jail than being out of jail.

name: patkun
text: and kept him in a large crate, no less.

name: norrin
text: My squirell comment goes here. Pretend this is where it is.

name: luke_johnson
text: I like how the box shakes in agreement in the last panel.

name: hyetal
text: Oh, you've talk to people who jump out of their seat and point at you when they shout, "Exactly!"

name: hyetal
text: Yay grammar.

name: jerkface
text: 5 for the first two panels alone

name: pwb
text: since when does teodor think cooking is lame

name: jdhenry105
text: Since he lost that round.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by cailetshadow, scraggg, echidnaboy, STUART)

name: betwixt
text:
just out of curiosity... am i the only one here who is obsessed with his my excrement due to my nationality?

ps: mr onstad, if you ever visit vienna again contact me pretty please.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Is cheap Freud joke. <badump!>

name: ocarinak
text: The criminal concurs with Cornelius so much in the last panel that he shook the metal crate.

name: i_love_kate
text: A comment left by i_love_kate was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dovey, Epicurus, scraggg)

name: tellumo
text: POPCORN was the number for the speaking clock in Northern California area codes, but it was recently decommissioned.

name: unsentletter
text:
I... I can't even handle how perfect that POPCORN reference is!


[ SPLUT! ]

name: falseprophet
text: Cornelius is so classy he can pass critical judgment on Europeans...in prison!

name: pyro_ike
text: Cornelius' classy conversation gives this strip the true sense of surrealism that  one would expect from Achewood.  Fived, good sirs.

name: apples
text: i imagine cornelius incarcerated in an alpine fortress in 1944, accused of being a spy, caught crossing the austrian border, trying to make switzerland to buy some time.

name: greenkoolayd
text: having been incarcerated is nothing to be proud of.  this is a funny strip/arc, nonetheless.
